tags.name: zui-expander
tags.description: All `<zui-expander>`'s are wrapped by and passed into `<zui-expander-group>` except for the standard expander aka peekaboo expander.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Determines whether an expander is open or closed

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: For standalone standard expander aka peekaboo expander, no type value needs to be specified; for all ``'s in a `` a type attribute and value must be specified, e.g. type="group-standard || group-popout || group-lightweight"

attributes.name: expand-label
attributes.description: By default in standard aka peekaboo expanders, the closed state text says 'See more', assign a new value if necssary

attributes.name: collapse-label
attributes.description: By default in standard aka peekaboo expanders, the opened state text says 'See less', assign a new value if necssary

attributes.name: multiselect
attributes.description: Add attribute to `<zui-group-expander>` if you prefer ability for users to have multiple `<zui-expander>`'s open at once

properties.name: open
properties.description: Determines whether an expander is open or closed

properties.name: type
properties.description: For standalone standard expander aka peekaboo expander, no type value needs to be specified; for all ``'s in a `` a type attribute and value must be specified, e.g. type="group-standard || group-popout || group-lightweight"

properties.name: expandLabel
properties.description: By default in standard aka peekaboo expanders, the closed state text says 'See more', assign a new value if necssary

properties.name: collapseLabel
properties.description: By default in standard aka peekaboo expanders, the opened state text says 'See less', assign a new value if necssary

events.name: openchanged
events.description: Event is raised to `<zui-group-expander>` when the `open` property/attribute is have been changed or component first loads; allows `<zui-group-expander>` to police `<zui-expander>`'s in case consumers only want users to see one `open` expander at a time vs. having multiple opened

slots.name: content
slots.description: Slot for the content that will be visible depending on if `open` or not

slots.name: title
slots.description: Slot for title text, applicable to `<zui-expander>`'s in `<zui-group-expander>` only

slots.name: subtitle
slots.description: Slot for subtitle text within `<zui-expander type="group-popoup">`

slots.name: trigger
slots.description: Slot for `<zui-expander type="group-popoup">`, apply this `slot="trigger"` to the `<zui-button>` that will open your expander

slots.name: footer-button
slots.description: Slot for `<zui-expander type="group-popoup">` footer buttons, visible only when expander is `open`; apply this `slot="footer-button"` to the `<zui-button>`'s that will be visible in the footer

cssProperties.name: --zui-expander-trigger-placement
cssProperties.description: Flexibility in where consumers place the trigger that opens/close expanders

cssProperties.name: --zui-expander-trigger-animation
cssProperties.description: Customize timing and easing for animation reveals, helpful is default feels off based on content size

cssProperties.name: --zui-expander-group-popout-flex-direction
cssProperties.description: For `<zui-expander type="group-popout">`'s to customize header positioning flex-direction value

cssProperties.name: --zui-expander-popout-footer-display
cssProperties.description: For `<zui-expander type="group-popout">`'s to customize footer display property

cssProperties.name: --zui-expander-popout-footer-position
cssProperties.description: For `<zui-expander type="group-popout">`'s to customize footer justify-conent value

cssProperties.name: --zui-expander-popout-footer-buttons-margin
cssProperties.description: For `<zui-expander type="group-popout">`'s to customize footer button's margin-left value, note: rem(10) = 10px
